about_the_game:
This is a game that simulates a slap in the face competition, where players win the game by betting on their favorite player and buying the winner. The competition involves slapping each other in the face, and those who are knocked down early will be judged as losing. If you lose, you cannot receive rewards.

The process of the 'slap in the face competition' is very simple: two contestants stand face to face, alternate attacks, and use their maximum strength to slap each other's cheeks. Sometimes, the referee will score and determine the winner after a fixed number of rounds, and sometimes the game will continue until one side is unable to get up.

This type of competition originated in Russia and used to be a very niche underground activity in Eastern Europe. But in recent years, it has become popular on the internet and spread to more places in the United States and Europe.

If you have to win the game, then knock down the opponent.

Some strong men were killed by a slap in the face. In the 'slap in the face competition', the strong man was knocked down by his opponent and then urgently hospitalized due to cerebral hemorrhage. The doctor was unable to prevent the deterioration of the strong man's condition, causing severe damage to his brain and organ failure, and ultimately he never woke up from his coma again.

In recent years, the game of slapping each other has become popular, and it has attracted millions of viewers on the Internet. Under the cloak of 'bizarre and funny', slapping competitions actually have dangers and cruelty beyond people's imagination.
